text_original: yenes peçial deldho mayorasgo yla continue presente testigos escripturas yescritos papeles yrrecaudos eynforma ciones probansas que pida y saque depoder dequien contenga y debadar.
text_english: yen peçial deldho mayorasgo and continue to present witnesses, writings, papers and collections and evidentiary information that requests and removes the power of whoever contains and owes.
text_chinese: 并继续提供证人、著作、文件和收藏以及证据信息，要求并消除任何人所拥有和欠下的权力。

text_original: y si las pagas no fue presentescrivano quedello defee lasconfiesen rrenuncien las leyes des ba delanon numeratapecunia ydemas leyes destecaso y valga como mesmo lo hisiera.
text_english: and if the payments were not present, write that they confess that they renounce the laws of ba delanon numeratapecunia and other laws of this case and it is worth as if they did the same.
text_chinese: 如果没有付款，请写明他们承认放弃《ba delanon numeratapecunia》法律和本案的其他法律，并且值得认为他们也这样做了。

text_original: escritura de promiçion de dote otorgada por maria de sayas.
text_english: deed of promiçon of dowry granted by Maria de Sayas.
text_chinese: 玛丽亚·德·萨亚斯授予的嫁妆承诺书。

text_original: enlasiud de la trinidad puerto debuenos ayres en dos dias del mes deotubre de mil y seiscientos y sin quenta y ocho años.
text_english: enlasiud de la trinidad port of buenos ayres on two days of the month of October one thousand six hundred and fifty eight years.
text_chinese: 一千六百五十八年十月的两天，布宜诺斯艾利斯的特立尼达港。

text_original: y confesso aver rresevido depero sanches rrendon çinq pessos deaocho rreales elpeso enmoneda derresello usual corriente.
text_english: and I confess that I have reviewed depero sanches rrendon çinq pessos deaeight réales elpeso in current customary stamp currency.
text_chinese: 我承认我已经审查过 depero sanches rrendon çinq pessos deaeight réales elpeso 以当前习惯的邮票货币。

text_original: seis estuches de aocho rs cada uno.
text_english: six cases of eight rs each.
text_chinese: 六箱，每箱八卢比。

text_original: y atodo lo dho fueron presentes por testigos ju ramirez dearellano ju de ysarra y ju desaabedra quelo firmaron asimismo con migo el dho alcalde por falta escriba no pu ny real.
text_english: and all of this was attended by witnesses ju ramirez dearellano ju de ysarra and ju desaabedra who also signed it with me the mayor due to lack of writing and not real.
text_chinese: 所有这一切都有见证人 ju ramirez Dearellano ju de ysarra 和 ju desaabedra 出席，他们还与我市长一起签署了该协议，因为缺乏文字且不真实。

text_original: es declaraçion que cumplido eldho año seles adepagar por demoras açien rreales deplatta doble por cada mes hasta quellegen adar fondo alos rreynos deespaña alapri mer ancora.
text_english: It is a declaration that after the end of the year they will be paid for real delays of double money for each month until they arrive to give funds to the kingdoms of Spain for the first time.
text_chinese: 声明称，年底后，他们将获得每月双倍的实际延误费用，直到他们第一次到达西班牙王国为止。

text_original: antemy el cap don nicolas debaldibia y brisuela alcalde hordinario de ella por su mag parecio lucas machado besino desta dha siu.
label_extended: Validation; name and residence of party
text_english: antemy the cap don nicolas debaldibia and brisuela hordinario mayor of her for his mag seemed lucas machado besino desta dha siu.
text_chinese: 前面的帽子唐·尼古拉斯·德巴尔迪比亚和布里苏埃拉·霍迪纳里奥市长为他的杂志似乎是卢卡斯·马查多·贝西诺·德斯塔·达·西乌。

text_original: Hija lexitima de Manuel deperalta difunto y de dona juana de heredia salsedo.
text_english: Legitimate daughter of the deceased Manuel Deperalta and Dona Juana de Heredia Salsedo.
text_chinese: 已故曼努埃尔·德佩拉尔塔和多娜·胡安娜·德·埃雷迪亚·萨尔塞多的婚生女儿。

text_original: renunçiaçion deofiçio.
text_english: resignation of office.
text_chinese: 辞去职务。

text_original: yasufirmesa ycumplim obligo mis bienes avidosy ypor aver yrreboco anulo ydoy por ningunos otros poderes que aya dado antes de para que novalgan enjuiçio nifuera del.
text_english: I have already signed and complied with my assets, and for the sake of it, I cancel and give due to any other powers that I have given before so that they are not valid in court or outside of.
text_chinese: 我已经签署并遵守我的资产，为此，我取消并授予我之前授予的任何其他权力，以便它们在法庭或法庭外无效。

text_original: ypara todo loque dho es y a ello anexo y dependiente seles doy con libre yjeneral administraçion yrelebaçion enforma y con facultad deque lo puedan sostituyr enun o dos o mas procuradores entodo u en parte como les pareçieren.
text_english: And for everything that is and is annexed and dependent to it, I give you free and general administration and regular review and with the power to substitute it in one or two or more attorneys in whole or in part as you see fit.
text_chinese: 对于它所附属和依赖的一切，我为您提供免费的一般管理和定期审查，并有权根据您认为合适的情况，用一名或两名或更多律师全部或部分替代它。

text_original: confieso que dho esclabo no balemas cantidad que los dhos quatro sientos pesos deaocho rs que tengo resebidos.
text_english: I confess that my slave does not bear the amount that the two four or eight pesos that I have received.
text_chinese: 我承认我的奴隶承受不了我收到的两四或八比索的金额。

text_original: y yo el dho alcalde hordinario desumagd sertifico y doy fe q conosco a la dha otorgante y queal presente esta en su juyçio y memoria natural a lo que parese y muestra. y no firmo por q dixo no saber y asuruego lo firmo un testigo en rexistro.
text_english: and I, the hordinary mayor, confirm and certify that I know the granting authority and that this is in his judgment and natural memory as it appears and shows. And I didn't sign because I said I didn't know and a witness signed it in the record.
text_chinese: 我，普通市长，确认并证明我知道授予权力，并且这是根据他的判断和自然记忆所显示和显示的。我没有签名，因为我说我不知道​​，并且有一位证人在记录上签名了。

text_original: hisi mas baler pudiere dela demaçia hago graçia y donaçion pura mera perfecta ynrebocable aldho gobernador alonso depaez iasus herederos y sucesores.
text_english: If I could do more than anything else, I make a grace and donation that is pure, perfect and unreturnable to Governor Alonso de Paez and his heirs and successors.
text_chinese: 如果我能做更多的事情，我会向阿隆索·德佩斯州长及其继承人和继任者提供纯粹、完美且无法回报的恩典和捐赠。

text_original: ypara que detodo locontenido como dho es conste el doy presente apedim y de don fran dearroyo y salsedo yjo lexitimo deju antonio calbo dearroyo y dela dha su mujer.
text_english: And so that everything contained herein is clear, I give this request from Don Fran de Arroyo and Salsedo and the lexitimo of Antonio Calbo de Arroyo and his wife.
text_chinese: 为了使本文中包含的所有内容都清楚，我向唐·弗兰·德·阿罗约和萨尔塞多以及安东尼奥·卡尔博·德·阿罗约和他的妻子提出这一要求。

text_original: quedhas partes desitio ycassas seandepartir ygualmente sinqueenedifiçio ni en suelo aya detener mas ni menos launa oarte que laotra loqual doi apressiado en dossientos y sinquentapessos de a ocho reales 250 p.
text_english: The remaining parts of the site and houses are to be divided equally without difficulty or on the ground to stop more or less the one or the other than the other, which is expressed in two and a half pesos of eight reales 250 p.
text_chinese: 场地和房屋的其余部分将毫无困难地平均分配，或在地面上或多或少地阻止其中一个或另一个比另一个，这以两个半比索八雷亚尔250 p表示。

text_original: y renunçio laley del engano con el ter myno para pedir enmienda resiçion o suple mento del preçio dela cosa que sebende por menos delo que bale.
text_english: and I renounce the law of deception with the term myno to request amendment, rescission or supplement of the price of the thing that is sold for less than what it is worth.
text_chinese: 我放弃欺骗法，并用“myno”一词要求修改、废除或补充以低于其价值的价格出售的物品。

text_original: yeldho yndio no firmo por queno supo.
text_english: yeldho yndio did not sign because he did not know.
text_chinese: 耶尔多·因迪奥没有签字，因为他不知道。

text_original: ental manera que los esclabos que el suso dho saca y despacha desta dha siu y su distrito para que bayan allebar la tropa deganado bacuno que esta abiando para el reyno de chile.
text_english: in such a way that the slaves that the suso dho takes out and dispatches from this dha siu and its district so that they can carry the troop of cattle that is being prepared for the kingdom of Chile.
text_chinese: 这样，苏索多从这个达西乌及其地区取出并派遣奴隶，以便他们可以携带为智利王国准备的牛群。

text_original: y yo ladha ursula peres moran pido lisençia yexpreso consenti miento aldho mi marido estavn rruiz desanpayo parajunta mente conel dar poder yhaçer yotorgar escritura so breello.
text_english: and I ladha ursula peres moran ask for permission and express consent to aldho my husband is rruiz desanpayo together with him to give power and do and grant deed so breello.
text_chinese: 我拉达·乌苏拉·佩雷斯·莫兰请求许可并明确同意阿尔多，我的丈夫是鲁伊斯·德桑帕约，与他一起赋予权力，并授予布雷洛契约。

text_original: ochenta y nuebe onsas degalon falso aocho rs la onsa.
text_english: eighty-nine onsas degalon false eight rs the onsa.
text_chinese: 八十九 昂萨斯 德加龙 假八 RS 昂萨。

text_original: poder elcap ygnaçio demaleo.
text_english: power elcap ygnaçio demaleo.
text_chinese: elcap ygnaçio demaleo 电源。

text_original: Sepan quantos esta carta bieren como yo el alferes sebastian gomes de sosa residente al presente en esta siud de latrinidad puerto de buenos ayres.
label_extended: Notificatio; name and place of residence of parties
text_english: Know how many read this letter like me, Alferes Sebastian Gomes de Sosa currently residing in this siud de latrinidad port of buenos ayres.
text_chinese: 知道有多少人像我一样读过这封信，Alferes Sebastian Gomes de Sosa 目前居住在布宜诺斯艾利斯的 siud de latrinidad 港口。

text_original: recusar juesez escribanos y otros ministros. y apartarse delas tales recusaçiones silepareçiere sitar. y enplasar y nterponer querellas y acusaciones.
text_english: challenge judges, clerks and other ministers. and depart from such recusations if they appear to be necessary. and file and file complaints and accusations.
text_chinese: 挑战法官、书记员和其他部长。并在必要时放弃此类回避。并提出投诉和指控。

text_original: aserca delo qual renunçiamos las leyes y derechos de nuestro fabor con nuestro pro prio fuero domisilio y besindad dela ley que que dise que elactor debe seguir el fuero del reo.
text_english: This is why we renounce the laws and rights of our favor with our own jurisdiction, domicile and blessing of the law that says that the actor must follow the jurisdiction of the inmate.
text_chinese: 这就是为什么我们放弃对我们有利的法律​​和权利，以及我们自己的管辖权、住所和法律的祝福，即行为人必须遵循囚犯的管辖权。

text_original: aserca de lo qual renunçio mi proprio fuero domiçio y besindad de la ley que dice que elactor debeseguir el fuero del reo.
text_english: About which I renounce my own jurisdiction, domicile and blessing of the law that says that the actor must follow the jurisdiction of the defendant.
text_chinese: 对此，我放弃自己的管辖权、住所和法律的祝福，即行为人必须服从被告的管辖权。

text_original: y me asimesmo de haser las dylijençias nesesarias en horden a dar abiso al susodho para q hordene y disponga asuboluntad de los dhos esclabos y detenerlos con toda seguridad sin que ayan debolber a aser fuga.
text_english: and I also undertake to carry out the necessary precautions in order to give way to the suspect so that he can command and dispose of the number of the two slaves and detain them safely without them having to escape.
text_chinese: 我还承诺采取必要的预防措施，以便给嫌疑人让路，以便他能够指挥和处置这两名奴隶的人数，并安全地拘留他们，而不必让他们逃跑。

text_original: beynte y una dosenas de rosarios degueso atres pesos la docena.
text_english: beynte and two dozen rosaries of Gueso at three pesos a dozen.
text_chinese: 贝因特和两打格索念珠，一打三比索。

text_original: quelos bolbera todos enteramente aesta dha siu que en ella ara manifestacion pu ante la rl jus y ante quien mas con der pueda y deba.
text_english: that all of them will be entirely up to this dha siu that in it will be manifested before the rl jus and before whoever else can and should.
text_chinese: 所有这些都将完全取决于这个 dha siu，它将在 rl jus 以及其他任何能够和应该的人面前显现出来。

text_original: exseptuando como exseptuo si por muerte faltaren q entonses seabisto no ser obligado a asegurarlos y delo demas del dho seguro q deba aser de ellos lo are como tengo dho.
text_english: exseptuando as exseptuo if due to death they are missing that then it is necessary not to be obliged to insure them and of the rest of the dho sure that I must take care of them as I have dho.
text_chinese: exseptuando as exseptuo 如果由于死亡而导致他们失踪，那么就没有必要为他们和其余的 dho 投保，确保我必须像我有 dho 一样照顾他们。

text_original: enel qual dho patro nasgo susedi como hija mayor por aver fallesido eldho don manuel defrias martel mihermano como hija lixitima dela dha dona leonor martel degusman ultima poseedora del ldho patronasgo.
label_extended: Circumstance and place of residence of parties
text_english: in which my patron was born as the eldest daughter due to the death of Mr. Manuel Defrias Martel, my brother as the eldest daughter of my brother Leonor Martel degusman, the last possessor of the patron saint.
text_chinese: 其中我的守护神是由于曼努埃尔·德弗里亚斯·马特尔先生的去世而作为长女出生的，我的兄弟是我的兄弟莱昂诺·马特尔·德古斯曼的长女，莱昂诺·马特尔·德古斯曼是守护神最后的拥有者。

text_original: y enel entretanto que la toma nos constituymos por sus inquilinos precarios tenedores.
text_english: and in the meantime that it is taken we constitute ourselves as its precarious tenants.
text_chinese: 与此同时，我们将自己视为其不稳定的租户。

text_original: venta de esclabo gonsalo de bega al s alonso depaez corre jidor del cusco.
text_english: sale of gonsalo de bega slave to s alonso depaez corre jidor of cusco.
text_chinese: 将 gonsalo de bega 奴隶出售给库斯科的 s alonso depaez corre jidor。

text_original: y detodo lo de mas del monton y gruesa dela coranbre sean de sacar costos y costas y fletes dedha barca o barcas y delo que quedare an departir ygual mente segun y como se bendiere en este puerto.
text_english: and everything else from the heap and thickness of the copper is to be taken out costs and costs and freight of the boat or boats and what will still remain to be shared equally according to and how it is blessed in this port.
text_chinese: 铜的堆和厚度中的其他所有东西都将扣除一艘或多艘船的成本和运费，以及仍然根据该港口的祝福方式平均分配的内容。

text_original: pareçio unyndio lla mado pedro natural delaçiud decordova delaencomien da del capndonpo luis decabrera.
label_extended: Parties; their qualities and their places of residence
text_english: He appeared to be a native named Pedro, who was a native of the Decordova dela Comienda del Capndonpo Luis Decabrera.
text_chinese: 他似乎是一个名叫佩德罗的当地人，他是德科多瓦·德拉·科米恩达·德尔·卡普东波·路易斯·德卡布雷拉的当地人。

text_original: y rresiva y aya yco bre elpreçio por que lo vendiere.
text_english: and rresiva and aya and co bre the price for selling it.
text_chinese: rresiva、aya ​​和 co bre 是出售它的价格。

text_original: aserca delo qual renunçio miproprio fuero domisilio y besindad dela ley que dise que elactor debe seguir el fuero del reo.
text_english: about which I renounce my own jurisdiction, domicile and blessing of the law that says that the actor must follow the jurisdiction of the inmate.
text_chinese: 对此，我放弃自己的管辖权、住所和法律的祝福，即行为人必须服从囚犯的管辖权。

text_original: y en loscasos que se requieran contienda dejuiçio paresera ante quales quier juesez y jusas del rey nuestro sr eclesiasticas y seglares y ensus jusgados y tribunales.
text_english: and in those cases that require a dispute between judges and judges of our king, ecclesiastical and secular, and in their courts and tribunals.
text_chinese: 在那些需要我们国王的法官和法官之间、教会和世俗的法官以及他们的法院和法庭之间发生争议的案件中。

text_original: y desuboluntadse quiereconser tar conelalferez juanximenez que estapre sente p ar aserville tiempo deseis meses queadeenpesar a correr des dela fecha deste concierto por preçio dequatro pessos por cada mes.
text_english: and at your request you want to contact Mayor Juanximenez who is present to serve you for a period of six months, which may run from the date of this concert for the price of four pesos for each month.
text_chinese: 根据您的要求，您需要联系胡安西梅内斯市长，他将为您提供为期六个月的服务，该期限可以从本次音乐会之日起计算，价格为每月四比索。

text_original: nuebe abujas depiedras finas las seis aseis pesos y las tres aocho pesos.
label_extended: Asset; string of beads; price; quantity
text_english: There are fine stone needles, six to six pesos and three to eight pesos.
text_chinese: 有细石针的，有六到六比索的，也有三到八比索的。

text_original: como consta delos dhos dos bales firmados desu nombre sus fechas enesta çiudad enprimero desetiembre deste presente año.
text_english: as shown in the two signed trunks of his name and his dates in this city on the first of September of this year.
text_chinese: 正如今年九月一日在这座城市的两个签名箱所示，他的名字和日期。

text_original: abonetodo lo por mipte fecho yautuado ylo decontrario tache y contra diga endhos yenpersonas.
text_english: pay everything for my date and invoice and otherwise cross out and contra say endhos and en personas.
text_chinese: 支付我的日期和发票的所有费用，否则划掉并反对说 endhos 和 en personas。

text_original: quarenta nuebe onsas degalon fino abeynte reales onsa.
text_english: forty nine onsas degalon fine abeynte real onsa.
text_chinese: 四十九翁萨斯德加隆罚款阿贝因特真正的翁萨。

text_original: con q conosiendo lo dho el dho ldo martin martines de eulate en virtud y con formidad del poder que tiene me a hecho espera hasta que yo entre en el Reyno de chile a donde boy aserbir la dha plasa de fiscal con ren ta y situaçion de su magd.
label_extended: Scope of deed; name of parties
text_english: So knowing what he said, Mr. Martin Martines de Eulate, by virtue and with the power he has, has made me wait until I enter the Kingdom of Chile, where I will be able to claim the position of prosecutor with the income and situation of his magistrate.
text_chinese: 因此，马丁·马丁内斯·德·埃拉特先生知道他所说的话，凭借他的美德和权力，让我等到进入智利王国，在那里我将能够以他的治安法官的收入和状况申请检察官的职位。

text_original: pormy i como marido y conjunta persona de dona maría depintos. otorguo que doy todo mi poder cumplido el que der y se ness para balor al cap ju gu tierres de umanes besino desta dha siu.
text_english: pormy i as husband and joint person of dona maría depintos. I grant that I give all my power fulfilled what der and se ness for balor to the cap ju gu tierres de umanes besino desta dha siu.
text_chinese: 波米我是多纳·玛丽亚·德宾托斯的丈夫和联名人士。我承认我将我所有的权力都交给了 cap ju gu tierres de umanes besino desta dha siu。

text_original: obligo ssupersona ybienes abidos ypor aber en bastante y debida de dero = sinaseguramieto de la cobrança.
text_english: obligo ssupersona ybienes abidos ypor aber enough and due dero = no insurance of collection.
text_chinese: obligo ssupersona ybienes abidos ypor aber enough and due dero = 没有收款保险。

text_english: and bind our persons and personal property and estates eager and to see that we will do so safely and securely and in response to any demand or order that may be imposed at any time that they notify us.
text_chinese: 并迫切地约束我们的人员和个人财产和财产，并确保我们将安全可靠地这样做，并响应他们通知我们的任何时间可能提出的任何要求或命令。

text_original: quarenta y quatro tinteros debronse atres pesos cada uno.
text_english: Forty-four inkwells owed three pesos each.
text_chinese: 四十四个墨水瓶每个欠三比索。

text_original: y no asiendolo pueda el dho tutor delos uotro que en el dho offio le subseda a aser los dhos reparos amipropria costa y executarme por lo que montare el costo que por ello tubiere cuya liquidaçion difiero en susinple juramento.
text_english: and if this is not done, the guardian of the other person who, in the case of his office, subsidizes him, cannot make the said objections to my own expense and execute me for what I will mount the cost that he may incur, the liquidation of which I defer in his simple oath.

text_original: asi endemandando como defendiendo yenotra qual quier manera con que no rresponda anueba demanda nipedim que nuebamente seme ayapuesto o ponga sinque primero seme notifique enpersona.

text_english: and we also give him fulfilled power so that in our name he can substitute this power according to and how it is contained in one two or more people and in whom it seems to be transferred by some substitutes and others again created.

text_chinese: 我们宣布 rrex obus 和其他关于曼科社区的真实性，我们根据我们所拥有的赋予权力，我们有这个城市的 afranco rro drigues delatorre vzo，该城市将前往科尔多瓦省德尔图库曼市。

text_original: husar todo jenero de prueba tachas y abonos sitar en forma y pedir terminos hordinarios y extrahordinarios renunçiarlos y pedir otros de nuebo tomar qualesquier poseçiones.
text_english: Use all types of proof, defects and credits, keep in shape and ask for hordinary and extraordinary terms, renounce them and ask for others, and take any possessions again.
text_chinese: 使用所有类型的证据、缺陷和信用，保持状态并要求普通和特殊条款，放弃它们并要求其他条款，并再次拿走任何财产。

text_original: ante my el almirante don eujenio decastro teniente jeneral a jusa y guerra desta probinçia pareçieron el alferes pedro de asoca urtado de mendosa y el capn pedro desalasar besino desta dha siud anbos cuñados.
text_english: Before me, Admiral Don Eujenio Decastro Lieutenant General to Jusa and Guerra of this probinçia appeared Alferes Pedro de Asoca Urtado de Mendosa and Captain Pedro Desalasar kissed these two brothers-in-law.
text_chinese: 在我面前，海军上将唐·尤金尼奥·德卡斯特罗（Don Eujenio Decastro）、中将尤萨（Jusa）和格拉（Guerra）出现在阿尔费雷斯·佩德罗·德·阿索卡·乌尔塔多·德·门多萨（Alferes Pedro de Asoca Urtado de Mendosa）上，佩德罗·德萨拉萨上尉亲吻了这两位姐夫。

text_original: sin enbargo deque renunçia entriega por desir que no pareçio depresente por que a pedimiento del dho bendedor setrajo la dha plata ysepuso depresente y seconto en presençia detodos y dedhos testigos alos quales sertifico que conozco.
text_english: However, he disclaims that he did not appear present because at the request of the blessed blesser he took the silver and was present and present in the presence of all the witnesses whom I am aware of.
text_chinese: 然而，他否认自己没有出现在场，因为应受祝福的祝福者的要求，他拿走了银子，并出现在我所知道的所有证人面前。

text_original: y ledamos poder y faculcultad para quedesu propria autory dad o conla dela rl jus se entre en el y tome y henprehenda la poseçion rl actual corporal.
text_english: and we give him power and authority so that his own authority or with that of the rl jus enters into him and takes and holds the current bodily possession.
text_chinese: 我们赋予他权力和权威，以便他自己的权威或与 rl 的权威一起进入他并获得并持有当前的身体财产。

text_original: y por preçio y quantia desiento ochenta pesos deaocho reales que confesamos nos adado ypagado enrs decontado moneda debuena ley.
text_english: and for price and amount I am eighty pesos of eight reales that we confess was added and paid in cash of good currency.
text_chinese: 至于价格和金额，我是八十比索八雷亚尔，我们承认这是用优质货币现金支付的。

text_original: ypaso ante my elcap don nicolas debaldibia y brisuela alcalde hordinario de ella porsu mag. estando enesta siu dela trinidad.
text_english: and I pass before my elcap don nicolas debaldibia and brisuela hordinario mayor of her for her mag. being in this siu of the trinity.
text_chinese: 我从我的埃尔卡普·唐·尼古拉斯·德巴尔迪比亚和她的市长布里苏埃拉·霍迪纳里奥面前走过，欣赏她的杂志。处于三位一体的这个siu中。

text_original: que todos lo firmaron con el otorgante a quien doy fe conosco porla dha falta de escribano. y todos lo firmaron como dho es en rexistro.
text_english: that they all signed it with the grantor whom I attest I know due to the lack of a notary. and everyone signed it as dho es on record.
text_chinese: 他们都与授予人签署了协议，我证明我认识该授予人，因为没有公证人。每个人都在记录上签名为 dho es。

text_original: y decartas depago del confesando la paga caso que no paresca depresente.
text_english: and payment letters from the acknowledgment of payment in case it does not appear to be present.
text_chinese: 以及付款确认函（如果付款确认书似乎不存在）。

text_original: recusar juesez escribanos y otros ministros y apartarse delas tales recusaçiones sibiene ser conbe niente. y sacara quales quier testimonios de ofiçios y rs probiçiones y otros recaudos y usara de ellos.
text_english: challenge judges, clerks and other ministers and deviate from such challenges if appropriate. and he will take whatever testimonies he wants from offices and rs prohibitions and other precautions and will use them.
text_chinese: 质疑法官、书记员和其他部长，并在适当的情况下回避此类质疑。他将从办公室、RS 禁令和其他预防措施中获取他想要的任何证词，并将使用它们。

text_original: enplata portanto enaquella bia yforma queaya lugar enderecho otorgamos porla presente carta que damos enbenta rl agora ypara sienpre jamas al dho ju miguel dearpides y asus herederos yquien delo dellos ubiere titulo rason orecurso enqualquier manera las dhas casas debibibienda que quedaron porbienes del dho lisen bartolome dela ensina yacargo del ldo luis rodrigues de lujan que asimesmo esdifunto.
text_english: in silver therefore in that bia and way that a place in right we grant by the present letter that we enbenta rl now and forever never to the dho ju miguel dearpides and his heirs and whoever of them has title reason or resource in any way the two dubibibienda houses that were left for the property of the dho lisen bartolome dela ensina and charge of the ldo luis rodrigues de lujan who is also deceased.
text_chinese: 因此，以白银的方式，我们通过这封信授予我们权利，即我们现在并永远永远不会将两栋 dubibibienda 房屋归给 dho ju miguel Dearpides 及其继承人，以及他们中任何人以任何方式拥有所有权原因或资源，这两栋 dubibibienda 房屋为 dho lisen bartolome dela ensina 的财产并由 ldo luis rodrigues de lujan 负责。死者。

text_original: cuyo tenor deldho poder y sosti tuçion alaletracomo estan enpapelsellado es como sesigue.
text_english: whose tenor of the power and support at the letter as they are in sealed paper is as follows.
text_chinese: 信中的权力和支持的大意如下。

text_original: y otros litixios algunos lesalieren luego queseme de labos tomare en mi la defensa lo seguire y fenesere a mi pro pria costa y mençion asta le de jus en quieta y pasifica poseçion.
text_english: and other disputes, some of them will then come to light, that I will take responsibility for my defense, I will follow him and defend him at my own expense and mention until I give him justice in quiet and peaceful possession.
text_chinese: 以及其他争议，其中一些将被揭露，我将承担我的辩护责任，我将跟随他并自费为他辩护，直到我在安静和和平的情况下给他伸张正义。

text_original: y pedir que se probean otros sacando rs probiçiones y otros autos y mandamyentos que amy derecho convengan.
text_english: and ask that others be tested by issuing prohibitions and other orders and orders that are appropriate to the law.
text_chinese: 并要求通过发布禁令和其他符合法律的命令和命令来检验其他人。

text_original: dixo que haçia eiso renunçiaçion deldho ofiçio detal depositario je neral desta dha siu manos de su mag yparaque enterando enlas reales caxas desta dha siu lo que por rason desta dha renunçiaçion les toca y sedebe enterar sele despache al contenido titulo enforma para el uso y exerçisio del dho oficio.
text_english: He said that he had made this resignation of the office in question, the general depositary of this office in the hands of his magistrate, and so that by finding out in the royal boxes of this office what is due to them and should be disclosed, the contents of the document must be disclosed in order for the use and exercise of the office.
text_chinese: 他说，他已经辞去了有关职位的职务，该职位的总保管人交到了他的治安法官手中，因此，通过在该职位的皇家信箱中查明应予披露的内容，必须披露该文件的内容，以便使用和行使该职位。

text_original: y para ello obligo my persona y bienes abidos ypor aber y mesometo alos juezes y jus del rey nuestro señor para ser conpelido como por sentençia de juez conpetente pasada en cosa jusgada consentida y no apelada.
text_english: and for this I bind my person and assets abido and by aber and I submit to the judges and jus of the king our lord to be summoned as by a sentence of a competent judge passed in res jusgada consented and not appealed.
text_chinese: 为此，我将我的人身和财产限制在阿比多和阿贝尔的范围内，并服从我们主国王的法官和法律，根据在法律中通过的合格法官的判决，我同意并且不上诉。

text_original: yeldho pedro si se fuere yausentare lepagara las fallas quelehiziere consola estaescriptura lepuedan compeler aque lea cave deservir eldho tiempo.yquele puedansacar delpoder dedondeestubiere.
text_english: yeldho Pedro, if he were to leave and be absent, I would pay him for the failures that this scripture did to him that could compel him to read cave to serve the right time. and that could remove him from the power of wherever he was.
text_chinese: 耶尔多·佩德罗，如果他要离开并缺席，我会为这节经文对他造成的失败付出代价，这可能迫使他阅读洞穴以服务正确的时间。无论他身在何处，这都会使他失去权力。

text_original: ypara el seguro delos coridos ypoteco expecialmente mil yeguas decrias de mulas y con beynte y sinco garañones que tengo en la dha estancia yasimismo dies piesas de esclabos negros llamados anyonio simon pedro agustin manuel salbador margarita ysabel esperansa serafina.
text_english: and for the insurance of the coridos ypoteco especially a thousand mares bred from mules and with beynte and five stallions that I have in the dha ranch and also five horses of black slaves called anyonio simon pedro agustin manuel salbador margarita and sabelesperasa serafina.
text_chinese: 为了保障 Coridos ypoteco 的保险，特别是我在 dha 牧场拥有的 1000 匹由骡子和贝因特 (beynte) 培育而成的母马，以及我在 dha 牧场拥有的五匹黑人奴隶的马，他们分别是 Anyonio simon pedro agustin manuel salbador margarita 和 sabelesperasa serafina。

text_original: ypara el dho efecto des de luego o fresco por fincas baliosas y quantiosas unacha cra que tengo en el pago del monte grande quetiene mil baras detierras y linda acia la parte desta siud con tierras del jeneral jua de garay y por otro lado contierras de gas par lopezpacheco y tiene casas de vibienda y una taona coriente y moliente.
text_english: And for this purpose, of course, I am fresh from baliosa and large farms, a farm that I have in the payment of the big mountain that has a thousand bars of land and borders the part of this siud with lands of General Jua de Garay and on the other hand with gas lands for Lopezpacheco and has housing houses and a current and modern taona.
text_chinese: 当然，为了这个目的，我刚从巴利奥萨和大型农场过来，这个农场是我在大山上买的，它有一千块土地，与这个 siud 的一部分与 Jua de Garay 将军的土地接壤，另一方面与洛佩斯帕切科的天然气田接壤，有住房和当前和现代的陶纳。

text_original: para el efecto que yo pormipeticion pedy judicialmente la qual su decreto y aprobacion deldho tutor sacado a la letra escomo se sigue.
text_english: For the purpose that by my petition I judicially requested that his decree and approval of the guardian be taken to the letter as follows.
text_chinese: 为了通过我的请愿书，我通过司法方式请求将他的法令和监护人的批准严格执行如下。

text_original: y el suso dho obliguo deno despedirle asta que cumpla dho ano pena de pagarle debaçio dho salario y demás del dho salario.
text_english: and the obligation is not to fire him until he completes the penalty of paying him less than his salary and more than his salary.
text_chinese: 并且有义务在他完成支付给他少于他的工资和多于他的工资的处罚之前解雇他。

text_original: bente y nuebe pares demedias deseda desegunda suerte a seis pesos y medio.
text_english: Bente y nuebe pairs of second-round silk stockings at six and a half pesos.
text_chinese: Bente y nuebe 一双第二轮丝袜售价六比索半。

text_original: ypor no pareser de presente renunçiamos las leyes dela entriega y la non numerata pecunia paga yprueba del resibo.
text_english: and because it does not appear to be present, we renounce the laws of delivery and the non-numerata pecuniary payment and proof of receipt.
text_chinese: 由于它似乎不存在，我们放弃交货法和非数字金钱付款和收据证明。

text_original: y es obligado el dho alferez dele dar el sustento necesario en esta manera cada dia sele ade dar guisada lacomida dela mesa del susodho y todos los días medio rl de pan y para cada noche vianda y no ade entrar en quenta del dho sustento ni labibienda delacasa.
text_english: and the alferez is obliged to give him the necessary sustenance in this way, every day he must be given cooked food from the susodho table and every day half a rl of bread and food for each night and he must not enter into the account of the dho sustenance or the house's food.
text_chinese: 阿尔费雷斯有义务以这种方式为他提供必要的食物，每天必须为他提供苏索多餐桌上的熟食，并且每天每晚提供半个面包和食物，并且他不得进入dho食物或房屋食物的账户。

text_original: ycadauno porlo queleto ca seo bli garona cumplir dho consierto.
text_english: and each one therefore queleto ca seo bli garona fulfill dho consierto.
text_chinese: 因此，每一个 queleto ca seo bli garona 都履行 dho consierto。

text_original: y para todo lo dho y espresado les doy el presente con libre y jeneral adminstraçion y releba çion en forma y con facultad deque lo sostytuyan en uno dos omas procuradores las beses que les paresieren para enquanto afuero y juyçio y no enmas.
text_english: and for everything said and expressed, I give you the present with free and general administration and relief in form and with the power to be supported by one or more attorneys with the kisses that they wish for as far as outside and judgment and no more.
text_chinese: 对于所说和表达的一切，我给你一份礼物，在形式上自由和全面的管理和救济，并有权力得到一名或多名律师的支持，并提供他们所希望的外界亲吻和判断力，仅此而已。

text_original: antemy el cap don nicolas debaldibia y brisuela alealde hordinario de ella por su mag pareçio elalferes antonio dearaube y latorre besino desta dha siu y juan yndio ladino natural del reyno de chile.
label_extended: Validation; name and circumstance of parties
text_english: antemy the cap don nicolas debaldibia and brisuela alealde hordinario de ella por su mag pareçio elalferes antonio dearaube y latorre besino desta dha siu y juan yndio ladino natural del reyno de chile.
text_chinese: 前面的帽子唐·尼古拉斯·德巴尔迪比亚和布里苏埃拉·阿莱尔德·霍迪纳里奥·德·埃拉·帕雷西奥·埃拉费雷斯·安东尼奥·迪奥贝和托雷·贝西诺·德斯塔·达·西乌和胡安·因迪奥·拉迪诺·自然德尔·雷诺·智利。

text_original: las quales lindan por unlado concasas que ju garçia senero difunto ypor otro solar des poblado del cap po urtado medio consolar y casas delconbento de nuestra S delas mersedes y cap manuel gomes desarabia las quales eldho difunto las ubo yconpro del ldo ju biscayno clerigo presbitero como parese porla escritura queay dela dha benta.
text_english: which border on one side with houses that garçia senero deceased played and on another unpopulated lot of the cap po urtado medio consoler and houses of the convent of our S de las Mersedes and cap manuel gomes desarabia which the deceased put up and with pro of the last ju biscayno clergyman priest as it appears from the writing that ay de la dha benta.
text_chinese: 一侧是加西亚·塞内罗死者曾玩过的房子，另一边是无人居住的卡普·乌尔塔多·梅迪奥控制台和我们的圣德拉斯·梅塞德斯修道院的房子，以及死者建造的曼努埃尔·戈麦斯·德萨拉比亚角的房子，还有最后一位朱·比斯坎诺牧师的亲信，从 ay de la dha Benta 的文字中可以看出。

text_original: y aran enbargos y desenbargos pry çiones solturas execuçiones ventas y rema tes de bienes pedir anparos poseçiones restituçiones sitaçiones opoçisiones contradiciones.
text_english: and they carry out seizures and clearances for settlements, executions, sales and auctions of goods, asking for possessions, restitutions, situations, oppositions, contradictions.
text_chinese: 他们为和解、处决、销售和拍卖货物进行扣押和清理，要求财产、归还、情况、反对和矛盾。

text_original: y qual quier dellas haga eponga demandas pedimientos rrequerimientos tasaçiones protesta çiones querellas acusaçiones embargos desembargos secrestos depositos execuçiones priçiones solturas ventas transas yrrematas devienes etome suposeçion.
text_english: and whoever they do, file demands, petitions, requirements, assessments, protests, complaints, accusations, seizures, seizures, deposits, executions, prisons, resolutions, sales, settlements, and terminations, become the subject of possession.
text_chinese: 无论他们做什么，提出要求、请愿、要求、评估、抗议、投诉、指控、扣押、扣押、押金、处决、监狱、决议、销售、和解和终止，都成为占有的主体。

text_original: y final mente aran todo aquello que io hisiera presente siendo aunque aqui no baya expresado
text_english: and finally they will plow everything that would make it present being, although it has not been expressed here
text_chinese: 最后，他们将耕耘一切，使其成为现在的存在，尽管这里没有表达出来

text_original: onsierto pedro yndio de la encomienda dedon po luis decabrera vzo dela ciud decordova confeliçiano detorres por tiempo de 4 meses a seis pesos por cadames.
text_english: Onsierto Pedro Yndio of the encomienda dedon by Luis Decabrera vzo of the city of Cordova confeliçiano detorres for a period of 4 months at six pesos per month.
text_chinese: Onsierto Pedro Yndio 是科尔多瓦市 Luis Decabrera vzo 的 encomienda dedon，为期 4 个月，每月 6 比索。

text_original: que con fieso aver resebido y que estan depresente de mano del dho tutor y en preçençia desu md el sr alcalde hordinario desu magd ante quien pasa esta escritura y delos testigos deyuso escriptos.
text_english: which with faith has been received and which are present by the hand of the guardian and in the presence of his md the sr mayor hordinario of his magd before whom this deed is passed and of the witnesses of its written use.
text_chinese: 该契约已凭信心被接收，并由监护人亲手呈递，并在其MD、SR市长霍迪纳里奥在场的情况下，该契约在其面前通过，并有其书面使用的见证人。

text_original: yfinalmente ara todo aquello queyo hisiera presente siendo aunque aqui nobaya expresado. y q sean casos y cosas q para cada una de ellas se rrequiera expesial poder por que deba jo deste quiero seentiendan y con pre hendan.
text_english: and finally I will do everything that I made present, although it was not expressed here. and that they are cases and things that for each of them special power is required because I must understand and pre-find this.
text_chinese: 最后，我将完成我所呈现的一切，尽管这里没有表达。这些案件和事情对于每个人来说都需要特殊的权力，因为我必须理解并预先找到这一点。

text_original: En esta dha siu delatrinidad puerto debuenos ayres enbeynte y quatro dias del mes de otubre mil de demil y seis çientos y sin quenta y ocho años.
text_english: In this day siu delatrinidad port of buenos ayres enbeynte and four days of the month of October one thousand of one thousand and six hundred and fifty and eight years.
text_chinese: 今天是布宜诺斯艾利斯恩贝因特港的 siu delatrinidad 和一千六百五十八年十月的四天。

text_original: sepan quantos esta carta detestam bieren comoyo dona beatris de heredia salsedo mujer de juan antonio calbo dearroyo besino desta siu dela trinidad ypuerto debuenos ayres probinçia del rio de laplata.
label_extended: Notificatio; name and place of residence of parties
text_english: Know how many detest this letter as well as I do, Dona Beatris de Heredia Salsedo, wife of Juan Antonio Calbo de Arroyo, kiss this siu de la Trinidad y Puerto de Buenos Ayres, probinçia del Río de La Plata.
text_chinese: 知道有多少人和我一样厌恶这封信，胡安·安东尼奥·卡尔博·德·阿罗约的妻子多娜·比阿特里斯·德·埃雷迪亚·萨尔塞多，亲吻了这封特立尼达和布宜诺斯艾利斯港，拉普拉塔河的问题。

text_original: en cuyo testimonio otorgue presente en esta dha siu dela trinidad puerto de buenos ayres a beynte y dos dias del mes de mayo de mil y seisçientos y sinquenta y ocho años.
text_english: in whose testimony I grant a present in this dha siu dela trinidad port of buenos ayres on one and two days of the month of May one thousand and six hundred and fifty and eight years.
text_chinese: 在他的证词中，我于一千六百五十八年五月的一日零两天，在布宜诺斯艾利斯的特立尼达港授予了一份礼物。

text_original: y ara todo aquello que yo hisiera presente siendo aun que aquy no baya expresado.
text_english: and I will do everything that I have made present even though it has not been expressed here.
text_chinese: 我会做我已经提出的一切，即使这里没有表达。

text_original: que todos ellos quiero que no balgan ni agan ffe en juycio ni fueradel salbo este my testamento que al presente hago y el qual quiero q balga por mitestamento ultima y postrimera voluntad.
text_english: I want all of them not to lose or suffer any harm in court or outside of it except for this my will that I am currently making and which I want to bear by my last and last will.

text_chinese: 我同意我现在和永远把恩本塔交给库斯科总督阿隆索·德佩斯·科雷吉多尔，他是一位来自几内亚海岸的黑人奴隶，根据他的外表，他被称为安东尼奥·德·赫达，或多或少有点像贝因特人。

text_original: y asimesmo aran qualesquier cobranças de pesos de oro plata rs mercadurias joyas ganados mayores y menores carretas esclabos ropa de castilla y dela tierra y otros jeneros y frutos della a quese me deban y sean pertenesientes en qualquier manera.
text_english: and they will also collect any collections of gold pesos, silver, merchandise, jewelry, cattle, cattle, carts, slaves, clothing from Castile and the land, and other goods and fruits of the land to which they are due to me and belong in any way.
text_chinese: 他们还将收集来自卡斯蒂利亚和这片土地的金比索、白银、商品、珠宝、牛、牛、车、奴隶、衣服，以及他们应得的、以任何方式属于我的其他货物和水果。

text_original: ycomotal hija mayor nombrada en eltestamento que eldho mi hijo y otorgo conlos demas mis hermanos socuya dispusiçion falleçio eldho mipadre hizo yotorgo con los demas mis hermanos.
text_english: and as such eldest daughter named in the will that my son gave me and the rest of my brothers on whose death my father gave me and the rest of my brothers.
text_chinese: 正如我儿子给我和我其他兄弟的遗嘱中所指定的那样，我父亲在遗嘱中给了我和我其他兄弟。

text_original: otorguo que doy todo mi poder cumplido el que de dero puedo y nesso para baler al al feres jua rodrigues estela y al capn marcos gutierres besinos desta dha siud a anbos juntos y a cada uno deporssy ynsolidum con ygual facultad.
text_english: I grant that I give all my power fulfilled that which I can and do not have to bear to Al Feres Jua Rodrigues Estela and to Capn Marcos Gutierres kisses of this dha siud to both of them together and to each one deporssy and solidum with equal faculty.
text_chinese: 我同意，我将我所能承担和不必承担的全部权力交给阿尔·费雷斯·朱阿·罗德里格斯·埃斯特拉和马科斯·古铁雷斯船长，让他们一起亲吻这dha siud，并为每一位具有同等能力的deporssy和solidum。

text_original: aser opoçisiones contradyçiones recusaçiones de juezes escribanos relatores abogados acsesores y otros ministros debajo de los juramentos nesesarios y apartarse delas tales recusaçiones si les pareçieren sacar qualesquieres reales probisiones y otros despachos utiles a mys derechos y acciones y asimesmo los testimonios y conpulsados que por bien tubieren.
text_english: make oppositions, contradictions, recusals of judges, notaries, reporters, lawyers, advisors and other ministers under the necessary oaths and deviate from such recusals if they seem to draw out what they want, real prohibitions and other dispatches useful to my rights and actions and also the testimonies and affidavits that may be of interest to them.
text_chinese: 在必要的宣誓下，对法官、公证人、记者、律师、顾问和其他部长提出反对、矛盾、回避，如果他们似乎提出了他们想要的东西、真正的禁令和其他对我的权利和行动有用的信息，以及他们可能感兴趣的证词和宣誓书，就可以偏离这种回避。

text_original: los quales daran y pagaran al mayor domo que es y fuere desta dha siu. y quienes con libranças del dho cabildo los pidiere y ubiere deaber lo qual pagaran llana mente sin embargo ni contradiçion alguna sinq sea ness aser excurçion al uno primero que al otro nial otro por el otro.
text_english: which will give and pay to the greatest domo that is and is of this dha siu. and those who, with bills from the council, ask for them and owe them what they will pay plainly, however, there will be no contradiction unless it is necessary to make an excursion to the one first than to the other or to the other for the other.
text_chinese: 这将给予并支付给这个 dha siu 的最伟大的 domo。然而，那些拿着议会的账单向他们索要并欠他们将要支付的费用的人，不会有任何矛盾，除非有必要先去一个地方而不是另一个地方，或者为了另一个地方而去另一个地方。

text_original: ypara el cumplimy delo dho anbos ados obligaron sus personas y bienes abidos ypor aber.
text_english: and for the fulfillment of the deed both of them obligated their persons and property, given and due.
text_chinese: 为了履行契约，他们双方都将自己的人身和财产承担了义务。

text_original: ypara el seguro ypermanençia dequelas dhas casas agora y entodo tiempo estaran ynies tas y bienparadas y sque siempre baldran los dhos quatro sientos y sinquenta pesos para ser sierto y segure el dho prin sipal ofresco por mis fiadores al alferes ju deborda y a dona ysabel deperalta su lexitima muger mis suegros los quales estan presentes.
text_english: and for the insurance and permanence of the fact that the two houses will now and at all times be safe and secure and I know that the two will always be worth four and fifty pesos to be true and secure.
text_chinese: 为了保险和永久的事实，这两栋房子现在和任何时候都是安全可靠的，我知道这两栋房子永远价值四五十比索，真实可靠。

text_original: seobliga el dho diego lopes camelo dele dar de comer sustento corporal ness para dho mayordomo mujer y curarlo en sus enfermedades.
text_english: The Dho Diego Lopes Camelo is obliged to feed him bodily sustenance for the Dho butler woman and cure him of his illnesses.
text_chinese: Dho 迭戈·洛佩斯·卡梅洛 (Dho Diego Lopes Camelo) 有义务为 Dho 管家女管家提供身体食物并治愈他的疾病。

text_original: ante my el cap don nycolas debaldibia y bry suela alcalde hordinario de ella por su mag pa recieron el alferes manuel demarçianes como prinsipal pagador.
text_english: Before me, Cap Don Nicolas Debaldibia and Bry Sol, the hordinary mayor of it, for their sake, appointed Alferes Manuel Demarçianes as the main paymaster.
text_chinese: 在我之前，唐·尼古拉斯·德巴尔迪比亚 (Cap Don Nicolas Debaldibia) 船长和普通市长布赖·索尔 (Bry Sol) 为了他们的利益，任命阿尔费雷斯·曼努埃尔·德马西亚内斯 (Alferes Manuel Demarçianes) 为主要出纳人。

text_original: aserca de lo qual renun çiaron supro prio fuero domisilio sindad dela ley que dise que el debe seguir el fuero del reo.
text_english: About which they renounced their own jurisdiction domicile without the law that says that he must follow the jurisdiction of the prisoner.
text_chinese: 对此，他们放弃了自己的管辖权，没有法律规定他必须服从囚犯的管辖权。

text_original: ytres mill y quatro çientos y treinta ydos rreales debellon queeldho bernardo derreyna nos deve por dos vales firmados desunombre.
text_english: and three thousand and four hundred and thirty-two reals debellon that Eldho Bernardo Derreyna owes us for two signed vouchers in his name.
text_chinese: 埃尔多·贝尔纳多·德雷纳 (Eldho Bernardo Derreyna) 欠我们三千四百三十二雷亚尔，两张以他的名义签署的凭单。

text_original: y doy fe conosco alos otorgantes y lo firmo el dho alferes antonio de araube. y eldho ju yndio no firmo porque dixo no saber y asu ruego lo firmo untestigo.
text_english: and I certify that I know the grantors and I sign it by Mr. Alferes Antonio de Araube. and the Indian did not sign because he said he did not know and his request was signed by a witness.
text_chinese: 我证明我认识设保人，并由 Alferes Antonio de Araube 先生签署。而印度人没有签字，因为他说他不知道，而且他的要求是由证人签署的。

text_original: y alo dho fueron presentes por testigos los capitanes hernan juares maldonado toribio depeñalba y juan ramires dearellano y los torgantes aquien doyfe conosco. y nolo firmaron por que dixeron no saber y asu ruego lo firmaron los testigos eneste rexistro.
text_english: and at the same time the captains hernan juares maldonado toribio depeñalba and juan ramires dearellano and the torgantes whom dofe knew were present as witnesses. and they did not sign it because they said they did not know and their request was signed by the witnesses in this record.
text_chinese: 与此同时，队长埃尔南·胡亚雷斯·马尔多纳多·托里比奥·德佩尼亚尔巴和胡安·拉米雷斯·迪尔埃拉诺以及多夫认识的托尔甘特斯作为证人在场。他们没有签署，因为他们说他们不知道，而他们的要求是由这份记录中的证人签署的。

text_original: aserca delo qual renunçio suproprio fuero domiçilio y besindad dela ley que dise que el actor debe seguyr el fuero del reo.
text_english: about which he renounced his own jurisdiction domicile and blessing of the law that says that the actor must follow the jurisdiction of the prisoner.
text_chinese: 对此，他放弃了自己的司法管辖权，也放弃了法律的祝福，即行为人必须服从囚犯的管辖权。

text_original: y seguyra el juyçio ensegunda ynstançia asta su final concluçion ynclusibe y tacaçion decostas. para todo lo qual y a ello anexo y dependiente le doy elpresente conlibre y jenl administra çion y relebaçion enforma y con facultad de que lo sostituya las beses y en las personas quele paresiere.
text_english: and the trial will continue in the second instance until its final conclusion and conclusion and cost. For all that and to it annexed and dependent I give you the present with free and jenl administration çion and relebaçion in form and with the power to substitute it the kisses and in the people who seem to it.
text_chinese: 并且二审将继续审理，直到最终结论和结论及费用。尽管如此，我给你一份礼物，在形式上具有自由和正义的管理和关系，并具有取代它的亲吻和似乎它的人的力量。

text_original: y seobliguo deque agora ny entienpo alguno no le mobera pleyto en bargo ni contradision alguna agora y entodo tiempo como dho es.
text_english: and he was obliged that now and in my understanding no one would challenge him with a legal dispute or any contradiction now and at all times as it is.
text_chinese: 根据我的理解，他有义务现在和任何时候都没有人会用法律纠纷或任何矛盾来挑战他。

text_original: concargo queaya detener y tenga las dhas casas bien reparadas y tratadas de suerte queno bengan amenos.
text_english: I order you to stop and have the two houses well repaired and treated so that they do not become less comfortable.
text_chinese: 我命令你停下来，好好修理和处理这两座房子，以免它们变得不舒服。

text_original: delo qual otorgue lapresente en es ta dha siud dela trynidad puerto debuenos ayres en ocho dias del mes de otubre de mil y seisçientos y sinquenta y ocho años.
text_english: of which I grant the present in this day siud of the port of Buenos Aires Trinity on the eight days of the month of October one thousand and six hundred and fifty-eight years.
text_chinese: 我在一千六百五十八年十月八日的今天授予布宜诺斯艾利斯三一港的礼物。

text_original: antemy el cap don nicolas debal dibia y brisuela alcalde hordinario desta dha sui porsu mag.pareçio el depositario antonio bernalte delinares aquien doy fe conozco.
text_english: antemy the cap don nicolas debal dibia and brisuela mayor hordinario desta dha sui porsu mag.pareçio the depositary antonio bernalte delinares whom I attest I know.
text_chinese: 前面的帽子唐·尼古拉斯·德巴尔·迪比亚和布里苏埃拉市长霍迪纳里奥·德斯塔·达·苏伊·波尔苏·马格·帕雷西奥是保存人安东尼奥·贝尔纳尔特·德利纳雷斯，我证明我认识他。

text_original: luego que se nos de la bos lo seguiremos y feneseremos a nuestra costa quando no ayan bienes del dho difunto asta le de jus enquenta y pasifica poseçion.
text_english: Once the bos is given to us, we will follow him and settle at our expense when there are no assets of the deceased until he is legally granted possession.
text_chinese: 一旦死者被交给我们，我们将追随他，并在死者没有资产的情况下以我们的费用进行结算，直到他被合法授予占有为止。

text_original: portiempo dequa tro meses arrazon de aseis pesos dea ocho rreales por cada mes.
label_extended: Lenght of agreement and amount involved
text_english: for a period of four months, a rate of six pesos to eight reales for each month.
text_chinese: 为期四个月，每月汇率为六比索兑八雷亚尔。

text_original: de lo qual dispondran segun como les tengo dado por horden ynstitusion como yo hisiera presente.
text_english: which they will have according to how I have given them by order and institution as I would present.
text_chinese: 他们将按照我将要呈现的命令和制度给予他们的方式来获得这些。

text_original: eyo ladicha dona catalina de mercado aseto esta escritura segun ycomo en ella secontiene.
text_english: I am blessed by Dona Catalina de Mercado to read this writing according to how it is contained.
text_chinese: 我很幸运能根据唐娜·卡塔利娜·德·梅尔卡多的内容阅读这篇文章。

text_original: y en conformidad delo que dho es nos obligamos ala ebyçion seguro y saneamiento de la dha casa en todo yportodo delo que le toca y es pertenesiente enmanera deque agora entodo tienpo lesera aldho anbroçio pereyra y asus herederos y susesores sierta y segura depleytos enbargos contradiçiones y otros litijios.
text_english: and in accordance with what it is, we undertake the safe ebyçion and sanitation of the house in everything and for everything that concerns it and is pertinent in such a way that now at all times it will be clear and safe for the anbroçio pereyra and his heirs and his advisors to settle disputes and other disputes.
text_chinese: 根据实际情况，我们对房屋的一切以及与其相关的一切进行安全和卫生处理，以便安布罗西奥·佩雷拉及其继承人和他的顾问在任何时候都能清楚、安全地解决争端和其他争端。

text_original: en quales quier tribunales y jusgados assi superiores como ynferiores y en ellos aran quales quier pedimientos requerimientos presentaçiones todo jenero de escritos y recaudos.
text_english: in whatever courts and tribunals, both superior and inferior, and in them they will prepare whatever petitions, requirements, presentations of all kinds of writings and collections.
text_chinese: 在任何法院和法庭，无论是上级还是下级，他们都会准备任何请愿书、要求、各种著作和收藏的陈述。

text_original: consierto mayor domo diego lopes camelo a josefe arias montiel
text_english: I consierto major domo diego lopes camelo to josefe arias montiel
text_chinese: 我向多莫·迭戈·洛佩斯·卡米洛少校咨询约瑟夫·阿里亚斯·蒙蒂尔

text_original: que lo firmaron conmigo el capn don nicolas debaldibia y brisuela alcalde horinario desta dha siud ante quienpaso lacarta referida por falta de escribano puco ny rl.
text_english: That it was signed with me by the captain Don Nicolas debaldibia and Brisuela, the current mayor of this day Siud, to whom I passed the aforementioned letter due to lack of notary Puco ny rl.
text_chinese: 这封信是由船长唐·尼古拉斯·德巴尔迪比亚 (Don Nicolas debaldibia) 和布里苏埃拉 (Brisuela) 与我签署的，布里苏埃拉是当今 Siud 的现任市长，由于缺乏公证人普科·尼·RL (Puco ny rl)，我将上述信件传递给了他。

text_original: lo qual edecumplir ypagar pena de exon y costasdela cobransa y los dhos dosientos pesos de a ocho rs referidos deste senso y tributo bendo por preçio y quantia de quatro mil pesos de a ocho rs deplata coriente debuena ley.
text_english: which must comply and pay the penalty of exon and costs of the collection and the two hundred pesos of eight rs referred to in this sense and tribute bendo for the price and amount of four thousand pesos of eight rs of current silver of good law.
text_chinese: 它必须遵守并支付外显子的罚款和收集费用以及在此意义上提到的八卢比的两百比索和贡本多，其价格和金额为现行善法银币的四千比索的八卢比。

text_original: otorguo que doy en benta rl agora y para siempre jamas al s gobernador alonso depaes correjidor del cusco que al presente asiste yapara en esta dha siu.
text_english: I grant that I give blessings now and forever to Governor Alonso Depaes Correjidor of Cusco who is presently assisting and parading on this day.
text_chinese: 我承认，我现在和永远向库斯科州长阿隆索·德佩斯·科雷吉多尔致以祝福，他目前正在这一天提供协助和游行。

text_original: y alo dho fueron presentes por testigos don handres herrada pacheco fran decadis y ju ramires de arellano que lo firmaron conmigo el dho alcalde y sum dho s doctor don ma muel muños de quellar en este rexistro.
text_english: and alo dho were present by witnesses don handres herrada pacheco fran decadis and ju ramires de arellano who signed it with me the mayor and sum dho s doctor don ma muel muños de quellar in this record.
text_chinese: 证人唐·汉德雷斯·埃拉达·帕切科·弗兰·德卡迪斯和尤·拉米雷斯·德·阿雷利亚诺都在场，阿洛·多在场，他们与我、市长和苏姆·多的医生唐·马穆埃尔·穆尼奥斯·德奎拉尔一起在这份记录上签名。

text_original: y por no pareser depresente renunçio la pecunia y leyes de la entriega con la exsepçion y prueba del resibo.
text_english: and because it does not appear to be present, I renounce the money and laws of delivery with the exception and proof of receipt.
text_chinese: 由于它似乎不存在，我放弃金钱和交付法，但有例外和收据证明。

text_original: eyo corespondiendo aladha espera me obligo de ha ser la paga delos dhos quatro sientos y dies pesos de a ocho rs puestos en esta dha siud ami quenta costa y riesgo para fin del mes de marso del año quebiene de mil y seisçientos y sin quenta y nuebe sin mas termino niplaso.
text_english: I, responding to this, wait, I undertake to pay the two four cents and ten pesos of eight pesos placed in this dha siud at my fifth cost and risk by the end of the month of March of the year that is worth one thousand and six hundred and no five and nine without further ado.
text_chinese: 我对此作出回应，等待，我承诺在今年三月底之前以我的第五次成本和风险支付放入此 dha siud 的两四美分和十比索八比索，价值一千六百，而不是五和九，不用多说。

text_original: y delos testigos que enel estan firmados y fecha ynformaçion de ello y que es difunta ladha dona beatris de heredia salsedo otorgante.
text_english: and of the witnesses that are signed and dated and information thereof and that Ladha Dona Beatris de Heredia Salsedo grantor is deceased.
text_chinese: 以及已签名和注明日期的证人及其信息，以及 Ladha Dona Beatris de Heredia Salsedo 授予人已去世。

text_original: queson unas que con pre del almirante don eujenio decastro tenient jen ajus y guerra desta probinçia como albasea y heredero del liseniçiado don jasinto degodo y gomes arsediano dela santa ygleçia catedral desta dha siu por cuyo fallesimy bendio dhas casas.
text_english: They are ones that with the pred of Admiral Don Eujenio Decastro Lieutenant jen ajus y guerra de este probinçia as albasea and heir of the crippled Don Jasinto Degodo y Gomes Arsediano dela Santa ygleçia cathedral of this dha siu by whose fallesimy he blessed his houses.
text_chinese: 他们是与海军上将唐·尤金尼奥·德卡斯特罗（Don Eujenio Decastro）中尉一起担任阿尔巴塞亚（albasea）的人，也是这座 dha siu 大教堂的残疾唐·贾辛托·德戈多·戈麦斯·阿尔塞迪亚诺·德拉圣伊格莱西亚大教堂的继承人，他通过他的错误祝福了他的房屋。

text_original: sepan quantos esta carta vieren comoyo miguel de aguinaga morador desta siu y departida para labilla ynperial depotossy.
label_extended: Notificatio; name and place of residence of parties
text_english: Know how many see this letter as I do, Miguel de Aguinaga, resident of this siu and departing for Labilla ynperial depotossy.
text_chinese: 知道有多少人像我一样看到这封信，Miguel de Aguinaga，这个 siu 的居民，正前往 Labilla ynperial depotossy。

text_original: quelo firmaron conmigo dho alcalde y el dho otrogante en rexistro y doy fe conocerle.baen m y media bara y nuebe y treynta diez. en tre rs y siete. bale. no bale.
text_english: That the mayor and the other party signed it with me in the registry and I certify that I know him. It's a month and a half and nine and thirty ten. in three rs and seven. bleat. don't bleat
text_chinese: 市长和对方在登记处与我签字，我证明我认识他。现在是一个半月九点三十分了。三卢比和七卢比。咩咩叫。别咩咩叫

text_original: baen este papel comun quees enel quesedes pacha enconformidad delo acordado en esta rrazon por noaver sellado.
text_english: bathe in this common paper that is in which you remain pacha in accordance with what was agreed on this reason for not being sealed.
text_chinese: 沐浴在这张普通的纸中，在这张纸中，你按照不被密封的原因达成的协议保持帕查。

text_original: yde caer encaso demenos valer solas quales prometo deno pedir absolu çion nirrelaxaçion destejuramento anuestro muysanto padre ni anin gunperlado ni jues.
text_english: and of falling in case of less worth alone which I promise not to ask for absolution nor relaxation of this oath to our most holy father nor any gunperlado nor judges.
text_chinese: 如果仅在价值较低的情况下跌倒，我保证不会请求宽恕或放松对我们最神圣的父亲、任何枪手或法官的誓言。

text_original: los quales leadeservir sin aser lefallas ni ausentarse.
text_english: whom he leads to serve without failure or absence.
text_chinese: 他带领他们服务，没有失败或缺席。

text_original: y paraqueasi mes mo pueda pedir tasacion delas costas de los dhos pleitos y rresevir los pessos en quelas otras partes fueren condenados.
text_english: and so that I can also request an appraisal of the costs of the two lawsuits and review the costs in which the other parties were sentenced.
text_chinese: 这样我也可以要求对两起诉讼的费用进行评估，并审查其他当事人被判刑的费用。
